ygData.subject: RE: Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)
ygData.msgSnippet: What would be nice is if you fell through the pentagram and into the Plane of Hate.  No way back out except with a gate spell :)_
ygData.messageBody:
What would be nice is if you fell through the pentagram and into the Plane
of Hate. No way back out except with a gate spell :)_


> ----------
> From: J.R. Hyde[SMTP:jr@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 1:25 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)
>
> From: "J.R. Hyde" <jr@...>
>
> At 01:31 PM 7/29/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> >> Why does everybody think the spectre tower in oasis is a gate pt? Only
> >> thing up in the tower is a pentagram with a flame shooting
> >> up, would be the
> >> wierdest zone pt in the game then. Unless i am missing
> >> something anyways.
> >
> >because it is. it will be the gate to the Plane of Hate.
> >
>
> I have heard this before, but thats gonna be one wierd gate point. Its
> just
> a pentagram with a flame. Regardless, there is no reason for people to be
> dragging spectres all over the oasis now trying to get to this plane,
> cause
> their is NO GATE POINT RIGHT NOW. Sorry, we got several idiots on our
> server trying to take a look see at this and they are killing the poor
> people in the zone left and right :p
>
